value.verse:
Have mercy on me, O God,
for my enemies are hounding me; *
value.halfverse: all day long they assault and oppress me.

value.verse: They hound me all the day long; *
value.halfverse: truly there are many who fight against me, O Most High.
I will put my trust in you.

value.verse:
In God, whose word I praise,
in God I trust and will not be afraid, *
value.halfverse: for what can flesh do to me?
their only thought is to do me evil.
value.verse: All day long they damage my cause; *

value.halfverse:
they spy upon my footsteps;
 because they seek my life.
value.verse: They band together; they lie in wait; *
Shall they escape despite their wickedness? *
value.halfverse: O God, in your anger, cast down the peoples.
are they not recorded in your book?
value.verse:
You have noted my lamentation;
put my tears into your bottle; *

value.halfverse: this I know, for God is on my side.
value.verse: Whenever I call upon you, my enemies will be put to flight; *

value.halfverse: for what can mortals do to me?
value.verse:
In God the LORD, whose word I praise,
in God I trust and will not be afraid, *

value.halfverse: I will present to you thank-offerings;
value.verse: I am bound by the vow I made to you, O God; *

value.halfverse: that I may walk before God in the light of the living.
value.verse: For you have rescued my soul from death and my feet from stumbling, *
